com.skobbler.ngx.map
Interface SKMapSurfaceListener

public interface SKMapSurfaceListener

Listener for map surface events.

Version:
2.3

Method Summary

Method Detail

onActionPan

void onActionPan()
Notifies when an action on map is done.

onActionZoom

void onActionZoom()
Notifies when a zoom is done.

onSurfaceCreated

void onSurfaceCreated()
Notifies when the map surface is created or recreated. This will happen after the activity is resumed. Methods to the SKMapSurfaceView should be called only after this notification.

onScreenOrientationChanged

void onScreenOrientationChanged()
Notifies when the screen orientation has changed or when the map surface is created / recreated.

onMapRegionChanged

void onMapRegionChanged(SKCoordinateRegion mapVisibleRegion)
Notifies when the map region was changed. This method is called whenever the currently displayed map region changes. During panning/zooming, this method may be called many times to report updates to the map position. Therefore, your implementation of this method should be as lightweight as possible to avoid affecting performance.

Parameters:
mapVisibleRegion - - new map center

onMapRegionChangeStarted

void onMapRegionChangeStarted(SKCoordinateRegion mapRegion)
Notifies when the region of the map will begin changing. During one panning/zooming, this method is called once, at the beginning.

Parameters:
mapRegion - the current visible map region.

onMapRegionChangeEnded

void onMapRegionChangeEnded(SKCoordinateRegion mapRegion)
Notifies when the region of the map finished changing. During one panning/zooming, this method is called once, at the end.

Parameters:
mapRegion - the final visible map region.

onDoubleTap

void onDoubleTap(SKScreenPoint point)
Notifies when a double tap was done.

Parameters:
point - point where double tap was done.

onSingleTap

void onSingleTap(SKScreenPoint point)
Notifies when a single tap was made.

Parameters:
point - point where the single tap was done.

onRotateMap

void onRotateMap()
Notifies when the map was rotated.

onLongPress

void onLongPress(SKScreenPoint point)
Notifies when a long press was done.

Parameters:
point - point where the long press was done.

onInternetConnectionNeeded

void onInternetConnectionNeeded()
Notifies when map tiles need to be downloaded, but this can't be done because the library mode is set to offline.

onMapActionDown

void onMapActionDown(SKScreenPoint point)
Notifies when a pressed gesture has started.

Parameters:
point - point where the gesture has started.

onMapActionUp

void onMapActionUp(SKScreenPoint point)
Notifies when a pressed gesture has finished.

Parameters:
point - point where the gesture has ended.

onPOIClusterSelected

void onPOIClusterSelected(SKPOICluster poiCluster)
Notifies when a cluster was tapped. For more information see SKPOICluster

Parameters:
poiCluster -

onMapPOISelected

void onMapPOISelected(SKMapPOI mapPOI)
Called when a map POI was tapped on the map.

Parameters:
mapPOI -

onCompassSelected

void onCompassSelected()
Called when the compass was tapped.

onCurrentPositionSelected

void onCurrentPositionSelected()
Called when the current position is selected

onObjectSelected

void onObjectSelected(int objectId)
Called when an object (polygon or polyline) that was previously drawn on the map is selected

Parameters:
objectId - the id of the selected object (polygon or polyline)

onInternationalisationCalled

void onInternationalisationCalled(int result)
Notifies when the set internationalisation method was called.

Parameters:
result - the result of the method: 0 - failed, 1- ok, 2- option not supported by the current map installed

onOffportRequestCompleted

void onOffportRequestCompleted(int requestId)
Notifies when a request to render a map region to a file has been completed

Parameters:
requestId - the request's id
